ygData.subject: Correct me if I'm wrong...
ygData.msgSnippet: based on what I have read about how stats effect monks the following is true: Gold Opal Necklace +9 STA +6 AGI 0.1wt 90-100pp Is better than Gold Black Pearl
ygData.messageBody:
based on what I have read about how stats effect monks
the following is true:

Gold Opal Necklace
+9 STA
+6 AGI
0.1wt
90-100pp

Is better than

Gold Black Pearl Necklace
+7 DEX
+7 AGI
0.1
900-1000pp

And

Jagged Bands
5 ac
+3 str
0.1 wt
40-60pp

are better than

Platinum Black Pearl Rings
+6 AGI
+6 DEX
0.1wt
1000+ pp


If this is trye Verant are a bunch of idiots

I know one thing, I'm gonna wait a while before I
ditch my Golden BP Necklace, just in case they
suddenly realize that DEX is more inportant than
anything else.

Hammeron
27th monk of karana server
